name: Evolution
flavor: Sometimes they just grow a little too fast!
text:
- Evolution is possible upon reaching the required level
- Evolution thresholds: Level 3 for second stage, Level 6 for third stage evolutions
- Exceptions may apply for Pok√©mon with poor second-stage stats, such as Weedle/Kakuna/Beedrill
- For specific evolution conditions, you can contact a GM to create an evo-quest, but it's not required
- Characters who choose not to evolve at the required level can still receive evolved stats and moves (excluding abilities) and may evolve at a later point
